archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.4.10e: e) information regarding the crisis (e.g. actual and potential business impact) is shared with relevant external parties (e.g. service providers, threat intelligence partners, industry regulators, and organisations in the supply chain)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
